pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.numerictypes¶

Numeric type aliases for high-performance scientific computing, matching Fortran kind parameters, using NumPy.

Author: Rahul R. Sah

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

NumericTypes

Provides high-performance numeric type aliases matching Fortran kind parameters using NumPy.
class pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.numerictypes.NumericTypes¶

Provides high-performance numeric type aliases matching Fortran kind parameters using NumPy.

i8b¶

64-bit integer type.

Type:

Type[np.int64]

i4b¶

32-bit integer type.

Type:

Type[np.int32]

i2b¶

16-bit integer type.

Type:

Type[np.int16]

i1b¶

8-bit integer type.

Type:

Type[np.int8]

sp¶

Single precision (32-bit) floating point type.

Type:

Type[np.float32]

dp¶

Double precision (64-bit) floating point type.

Type:

Type[np.float64]

qp¶

Quad precision (128-bit) floating point type, or double if unavailable.

Type:

Type[np.floating]

i8b: Type[numpy.int64]¶
i4b: Type[numpy.int32]¶
i2b: Type[numpy.int16]¶
i1b: Type[numpy.int8]¶
sp: Type[numpy.float32]¶
dp: Type[numpy.float64]¶
